pokedexEntries.gold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedexEntries.silver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedexEntries.crystal: Because different types of Unown exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
pokedexEntries.ruby: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedexEntries.emerald: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedexEntries.diamond: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.
pokedexEntries.pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
pokedexEntries.platinum: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedexEntries.black: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedexEntries.white: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedexEntries.black2: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedexEntries.white2: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
pokedexEntries.x: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
pokedexEntries.y: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
